creator: thom@nowhereatall.com
text:
On repeated builds at different times, I get exactly the same results. I have no
trouble doing a manual ftp.

Note that I'm running commons-net.1.4.0.jar.

Here is the diagnostics:

creator: thom@nowhereatall.com
stevel@apache.org
text:
"no route to host" that is probably a firewall problem. 

try setting passive=true for a passive upload

creator: thom@nowhereatall.com
text:
This fixed the problem.

I don't know what passive mode means on ftp. Can we get the docs changed to
include a comment to try this when there is a no route to host error and for
other firewall problems?

Thanks.

creator: stevel@apache.org
text: fixed in CVS. Explained what passive FTP means, instead of assuming the reader knew.
